participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, James enjoys helping others and is passionate about animal welfare.
participant_1.background: i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue.

participant_2.name: Tasha
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, Tasha thrives in the music scene and loves expressing herself through art.
participant_2.background: i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza.
